frontmatter.title: Testing Private Code in C#: Breaking Encapsulation with InternalsVisibleTo Attribute
frontmatter.preview: Learn about the different options available for testing private logic in C# and how the InternalsVisibleTo attribute can help you access internal members without compromising the encapsulation of your code.
